description: Parity stabilization sprint covering command alignment, universal scan defaults, dynamic style-layer mappings, expression-fidelity protection in pull flow, and documentation/overview updates.

userStories.title: Command reality alignment
userStories.description: As an operator, I need runtime-facing docs/content to only use current supported command paths.
acceptanceCriteria: Canonical guide separates runnable commands from roadmap commands
No stale loop:figma-roundtrip references in runtime payload content
Regenerated plugin payload reflects sync:push/sync:pull workflow
userStories.notes: Updated guide practical commands section, updated handoff/figma-page-content.json, regenerated figma plugin payload.

userStories.title: Universal scanner defaults
userStories.description: As a user onboarding non-React projects, I need scan defaults and config that work beyond src/React assumptions.
acceptanceCriteria: scan-project supports multiple include/exclude patterns and project-type defaults
workflow config contains projectScan include/exclude defaults
scan report prints and persists effective scan config
userStories.notes: Added projectScan config in workflow, extended scan-project args/config resolution and document-style sfid component detection.

userStories.title: Dynamic style-layer mappings
userStories.description: As a team syncing arbitrary projects, I need style mappings generated from discovered sfids and available tokens.
acceptanceCriteria: No hardcoded hero-only sfid mappings remain in createConduitStyleLayer
Style mappings are generated deterministically from sfids + token names
userStories.notes: createConduitStyleLayer now infers style assignment by sfid semantics and token availability.

userStories.title: Expression fidelity guard
userStories.description: As token source maintainer, I need pull flow to protect canonical expression tokens from resolved overwrites by default.
acceptanceCriteria: Expression tokens are protected by default in loop-canvas-to-code
Explicit env var override exists for intentional overwrite
Sync metadata/logging reports protected token count
userStories.notes: Added STUDIOFLOW_ALLOW_EXPRESSION_OVERWRITE gate and expression-protection reporting in manifest/log output.

userStories.title: Documentation and overview refresh
userStories.description: As project owner, I need a clear before-vs-now map and updated canonical docs.
acceptanceCriteria: README links to guide, PRD, and overview
userStories.notes: Added docs/PRD_PARITY_STABILIZATION.md and docs/PROJECT_OVERVIEW_DELTA.md, updated README and guide references.
